personalInfo.name: Anees Saheba Guddi
personalInfo.title: Generative AI & LLMs | Distributed Systems | Data Engineering
personalInfo.currentRole: MS in Applied Data Intelligence @ San José State University

about.summary: MS in Applied Data Intelligence student at San José State University (2025–2027) specializing in Generative AI, LLM Fine-tuning, and Machine Learning Model Development. Architects intelligent systems that combine cutting-edge AI capabilities with production-grade software engineering.
about.expertise: Full machine learning lifecycle: designing and training neural networks from scratch, fine-tuning foundation models for domain-specific tasks, architecting LLM-based agentic systems with LangChain and LangGraph, and deploying scalable microservices.

currentlyWorkingOn: Building production-ready agentic AI systems with LangChain, LangGraph, and multi-tool orchestration
Exploring MLOps workflows, LLM fine-tuning techniques, and distributed machine learning training
Deepening knowledge in scalable data platforms and real-time streaming architectures
Contributing to open-source AI/ML projects and sharing insights through technical writing
Creating educational content on Gen AI and Data Engineering on Medium and YouTube

education.degree: Master of Science in Applied Data Intelligence
education.coursework: Gen AI LLMs, Agentic AI, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Big Data Algorithms, Distributed Systems, Scalable Data Platforms

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Information Science and Engineering
education.coursework: Data Structures and Algorithms, Database Systems, Software Engineering

responsibilities: Implemented rule-based chatbots for Printer Customer Support
Prepared and organized data from customer support transcripts
Performed text cleaning and keyword extraction
Integrated chatbot logic with backend APIs
Explored early LLM tools for response improvements
Designed RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express
Built cross-platform mobile dashboard using React and Ionic

featuredProjects.name: Distributed Kayak Travel Booking System
featuredProjects.description: Built a distributed travel booking system supporting search, booking, billing, and analytics. Developed AI-powered recommendation service.

featuredProjects.name: Airbnb Prototype with Agentic AI
featuredProjects.description: Built full-stack platform with Agentic AI Concierge using LangChain for personalized travel plans.

featuredProjects.name: Multi-Agent Blog System
featuredProjects.description: Multi-agent workflow using Ollama LLMs for automated blog content creation.

featuredProjects.name: Stock Data ETL & Data Warehouse Pipeline
featuredProjects.description: ETL pipeline for stock market data with dimensional data warehouse in PostgreSQL.

faq.question: What is Anees currently working on?
faq.answer: Anees is currently building production-ready agentic AI systems with LangChain and LangGraph, exploring MLOps workflows and LLM fine-tuning techniques, deepening knowledge in scalable data platforms, contributing to open-source AI/ML projects, and creating educational content on Gen AI and Data Engineering on Medium and YouTube.

faq.question: Tell me about her HP experience
faq.answer: At HP (Jul 2023 – Aug 2024), Anees worked as a Software Development Engineer implementing rule-based chatbots for Printer Customer Support. She prepared data from customer support transcripts, performed text cleaning and keyword extraction, built decision-based conversation flows, integrated chatbot logic with backend APIs, and explored early LLM tools for response improvements.

faq.question: Which projects use LangChain?
faq.answer: Anees has 2 projects using LangChain: Airbnb Prototype with Agentic AI (designed an Agentic AI Concierge using LangChain to generate personalized travel plans) and Career Counseling Agent (AI-powered career planning assistant built with Streamlit, Gemini, and LangChain).

faq.question: What is her education and GPA?
faq.answer: Anees is currently pursuing a Master of Science in Applied Data Intelligence at San José State University (Jan 2025 – May 2027) with a GPA of 3.5/4.0. She completed her Bachelor of Engineering in Information Science and Engineering from Visvesvaraya Technological University (Aug 2019 – Jun 2023) with a GPA of 7.9/10.0.

faq.question: What are her main skills?
faq.answer: Anees specializes in Generative AI & LLMs (LangChain, LangGraph, RAG, Vector Databases, Prompt Engineering), Machine Learning & Deep Learning (PyTorch, TensorFlow, Neural Networks), Programming (Python, SQL, FastAPI, React), and Data & Cloud Systems (AWS, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Docker). She has expertise in 70+ technologies across these domains.
